objectives.title: Reduce in 5 gallons
objectives.description: You need to reduce the usage of water in 5 galons to gain a star.

objectives.title: Reduce in 5% the car usage
objectives.description: You need to reduce the usage of car in 5% in the week.

objectives.title: Reduce in 3 Pounds the food loss
objectives.description: You need to reduce the food loss in 3 pounds.
